metadata.title: BellyLady 100pc Belly Dance Coins For Costume DIY, Cavalier Design On One Side
features: Belly dancing coins - 100 coins per package
Approx 3/4 of an inch in diameter
description: Color: available in gold and silver
Coins: 100 pcs. If you want to purchase more coins as wholesale, please search the model BDSH-DK16195Q10.

Each coin has a hole drilled through the top to allow easy threading. The coins are easily sew on to your own costumes. Each one has the pretty bird design on one side as a complement. Why not make your own belly dance costume and decorate it with our typical belly dance coins? These coins are the same as found on our belly dance hip scarves and they make a wonderful sound when shimmy! Just try them!
